chatTimeStamp.config.time.seconds.toolti: Include seconds on the time message
chatTimeStamp.config.time.message.toolti: Append the time on every message instead of once per time change
chatTimeStamp.config.time.enable.tooltip: Toggle the activation of the Clock
chatTimeStamp.config.spam.enable.tooltip: Toggle the activation of Anti Spam
chatTimeStamp.config.ping.regex.tooltip: Ping if a chat line contains this Regex
chatTimeStamp.config.ping.sound.tooltip: Sound to be played on ping
